title: Menlo Park Follow-Up Communication
summary: Documents the follow-up correspondence and review period after initial WCO civic submissions to Menlo Park City Council.
details: Summarizes official responses and timeline acknowledgments received following prior public comments.
Notes the transition from single-city documentation to multi-jurisdictional correlation as data patterns became evident.
Provides reference points for later cross-analysis with border and coastal city records.

updates.text: Follow-up notice filed; awaiting council response.
Merged into WCO ledger tracking regional consistency.
